Entrega pactada de NFT a todos los usuar: Scheduled NFT delivery to users and land map
Consultanos tu inquietud y te respondere: Send your concerns and we will answer as soon as possible
¿Cómo se puede formar parte de Cripto Co: How can you be a part of Cripto Country?
Los usuarios podrán acceder al Marketpla: Users will be able to access the Cripto Country Marketplace after the launch, through the website. Also they will be a computer app, scheduled for december 2022.
¿Cómo se podrá acceder a Cripto Country?: How can you access to Cripto Country?
¿Cómo y cuándo se podrá jugar en Cripto: How and when can you play in Cripto Country
El lanzamiento oficial del juego está pr: The official game launch is scheduled for december 2022. From that moment on, users will be able to use their Digital Lands and access the game.
¿Cómo se puede jugar e interactuar en Cr: How can you play and interact in Cripto Country?
Los usuarios de Cripto Country podrán ju: Cripto Country users will be able to play in order to generate benefits, in addition to making investments on the platform and interacting with other users. This will generate a constant flow of actives thanks to the users, which will be the force that drives the project.
Un Terreno Digital es un NFT, el primer: A digital land is an NFT, the first investment good in Cripto Country, this will allow users to build properties in them. Cripto Country cities are conformed by digital lands, limited and uniques
NFT corresponde a las siglas «non fungib: NFT correspond to «non fungible token». This is a unique digital asset that it´s verifiable, indivisible, unchangeable and indestructible. This make´s it an investment object, and in some cases, a colectible item.
¿Cómo y a través de que medios se pueden: How and by which means can you buy digital lands?
Una vez en la plataforma de Cripto Count: Once in the Cripto Couuntry platform, users will be able to access the purchase of digital land. The only purchase means are bank account transfer or virtual wallet
¿Cómo se entregan los títulos de propied: How are the digital land property titles delivered?
La entrega de los títulos de propiedad d: The digital land property titles will be sent via e-mail, to the mailing adress associated to the user in the Cripto Country platform
¿Cómo y cuándo se entregarán los Terreno: How and when will the digital lands be delivered
La fecha de entrega pactada, de los Terr: The digital land delivery is scheduled for december 2021. In order to access them, users must enter the Cripto Country platform.
¿Cómo variará el valor de los Terrenos D: How the Digital Land value will vary?
El valor de los Terrenos Digitales, será: The Digital Land value will fluctuate acording to the market, the offer and demand of the users. But, thaks to the constant game updates, the users investments and interactions within it, it is projected that the value of Digital Lands will increase.
¿Cómo y cuándo se podrán comercializar l: How and when the Digital Lands can be commercialised
Se podrán comercializar los Terrenos Dig: The Digital Lands can be marketed in the Marketplace of the Cripto Country platform, with a scheduled launch date in February 2022.
¿Los Terrenos Digitales son transferible: Are the Digital Lands transferable directly between users?
Los Terrenos Digitales, NO son ni comerc: The Digital Lands are NOT tradable, transferable or inheritable between users directly or indirectly. Doing so harms the community and will be penalized. The only way to commercialize them will be through the Crypto Country Marketplace.
El arte se abre paso en el camino del Me: The Art gets into the road to the Metaverse
Como se publicó anteriormente el Marketp: As previously published, the Marketplace is ready despite the fact that it will not be fully implemented for the sale of land until August. Presenting to the Criptonian artists their place in Cripto Country, enabling the buying and selling of NFT art in our Marketplace. Every artist that wishes to expose and sell their work (Painting, audio, videos, etc.) will be able to do it taking advantage of the interface, security and exposure that Cripto Country offers.
Cambio de precios para BitcoinCity y Eth: New prices for BitcoinCity y EthereumCity
Debido al proceso de crecimiento al que:
Due to the growing process that Cripto Country has passed in the last few months, with the arrive of local and international investors, and the advance of the project, which let us have an impact in the European and Asian market, we have been forced to update the land prices in order to adapt this markets and their high demand. At the moment this will only apply for Bitcoin City and Ethereum City.

Given this, the current prices are:

BITCOIN CITY: 135 USD
ETHEREUM CITY: 210 USD
TORRENT CITY: 250 USD
TRON CITY: 300 USD
TREZZOR CITY: 350 USD
Con el nuevo Roadmap fijado tras la DAO: With the new Roadmap settled after the DAO, we are getting ready for the launch of the Cripto Country coin; this Token will have the UTC (Unit Trade Coin) denomination, like it was planned in the whitepaper. It will be the fundamental coin inside the metaverse, it´ll act as a nexus  between the virtual world and the physical world, allowing the exchange with fiat currency and other crypto actives in the exchanges. We will have an exclusive presale inside our web, through Metamask, that is programmed to begin around mid March, and for a duration of a month. The initial price will be announced before the launch and the purchase coin will be USDT. The system includes a direct purchase with porcentual increases, in stages based on the sell amount, it also contemplates a vesting with partial releases every 30 days.

Nuestro CEO y fundador Giovanni Caroglio: Our CEO and founder Giovanni Caroglio has been meeting with part of the Cripto Country team for more than a week in Dubai holding scheduled meetings with investors from Europe and Asia, which represents a very important milestone for the project's evolution, not only because of the potential demand of these markets (which is huge), but of the interest that Crypto Country has awaked in the mecca of technological investments! We are certainly taking giant steps in the right direction. We will continue to inform you about the result of this journey as far as possible, considering the sensitivity of the information.
